activities: Scioderm is a biopharmaceutical company engaged in the discovery, development and commercialization of drugs to treat human diseases, including oncology, autoimmune and inflammatory diseases.In the course of its business, Scioderm is conducting  clinical trials where subjects provide access to personal information including but not limited to: medical history, physical exam, laboratory test data, date of birth, initials, gender, adverse events, medication history and concomitant medications.Data is collected in order to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the investigational product under investigation.
eucountries: Austria, France, Italy, Netherlands, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Medical history, physical exam, laboratory test data, date of birth, initials, gender, adverse events, medication history and concomitant medications. (Data is collected either in an electronic case report form or paper case report forms.)
